website_summaries.verdict: Cranium Dark is the best variant of charades available, and trying to convey the concept of “invisible” as a zombie is a prime example of how wild this game is.
pros: You have 60 seconds to guess a concept while expressing it in a weird, silly, or hilarious way
Includes 340 Cranium cards and 40 action cards, clay, paper pads, and timer
cons: Tame for an “after dark” game aimed at adults

customer_reviews.title: All of the topics and situations are pretty tame It's entertaining as a party game
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a lot that's "Dark" about this game. All of the topics and situations are pretty tame It's entertaining as a party game, but that has more to do with the people you play with. The original board game is much more fun. I would likely choose others over this one for future game nights.
customer_reviews.author: YouDon'tNeedToKnowMe

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I have game nights with games we wouldn't play with our kids... I bought this for those nights... it's not that "dark" as the box suggests. Maybe teen level. We grew bored with it pretty quick and a lot of the action items were too hard or didn't match so we kept switching. It was disappointing. It's one of those like, "act out this while doing this" kind of games... so for example, card 1) pretend you are a sportscaster...card 2) as a leprechaun
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: more fun version of charades
customer_reviews.text: This game is the best. Its like charades with an extra component added. I would say this is a great family game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun game. It doesn't come with many cards, but with the many combination of cards it can last through a lot of game play. This is a party game so there is no board. My family plays it which consists of teens and adults. It hasn't been too inappropriate. Kids younger than teens may find it difficult and somewhat inappropriate, but of course this game isn't meant for children. We spend hours laughing while playing this.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: SO funny!
customer_reviews.text: This game is hilarious. I haven't laughed so hard in a very long time. Everyone that played loved it! It was even requested to be brought to our family's Christmas gathering! Good game, not too raunchy, but certainly is fun.
customer_reviews.author: PBandJ

customer_reviews.title: More like charades than the classic cranium game
customer_reviews.text: We love the cranium board game and cranium wow board game. We got this to switch things up. This is more of a charades than other versions of cranium. Lots of acting out, in different ways when using the Action cards. Also, sometimes it’s hard to act out the clue cars with the action you pick. (Like-How do you blindfold sculpt “tantrum”?) none the less, we enjoyed playing on a couples game night
customer_reviews.author: Joseph/Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Laughed until I cried
customer_reviews.text: I go to a game night at a bar and they have wild card night where you can bring in your own game to play so I brought this. Let me tell you I haven’t laughed this much in years. To see a grown man acting like Godzilla screeching at the top of his lungs 😂 then to have a woman act out her card while pretending to be Elvis. It’s a good adult game that gets you comfortably out of your comfort zone. Godzilla made other bar patrons leave the area and go sit outside away from the game night group. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a bday present for my son, who loves charades. We played it as a family and had a blast - even those of us who hate charades (me) got into it because everyone looked ridiculous while they played ;) Lots of fun for older kids (I would say 12 and up, maybe, though our 10-yo enjoyed it), just be aware that there are some cards with mildly suggestive actions or characters that kids may not be familiar with - nothing terribly inappropriate. We just skip over those and still have plenty to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T.

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this game as a Christmas gift and we did end up playing it. We all had a blast. Everything was unpredictable and just reading what you had to do on your turn was fun let alone trying to accomplish it without laughing too hard. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for friends/family
customer_reviews.text: Great game for adults. We played this game with my husband, parents and sister and we all had a great time and laughed a lot. Nice because it is intended for adults but not super inappropriate where its uncomfortable to play with family members.
customer_reviews.author: Nick/Sara Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as fun as the classic Cranium game
customer_reviews.text: This game is kind of dumb , after reading the directions and playing one practice round the general conclusion was “ let’s just go back to the regular cranium game and play it instead”. This version of Cranium is not really like Cranium at all, just convoluted and didn’t grab us at all.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, you should try it.
customer_reviews.text: It brought together the best parts of Classic Cranium and games like Cards Against Humanity/Apples to Apples. This was PG (or more risqué if you chose) and really fun. You choose an action (that everyone knows) and do that action while trying to get people to guess your thing. There is the added Cranium creativity of sculpting, drawing and acting to mix it up and keep everyone on their toes. Play time can be quick and so you can play again or move to a different game.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: PG RATING.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very fun game. Lots of laughs. It give the impression of a mature game by t it was very pg. PG13 at the most!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not pleased with this game
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not pleased with this game. Purchased it for my daughter for Christmas and we've played it once. I am now selling it at a yard sale. Difficult instructions to understand and it is not that entertaining/fun even for adults. Original cranium or kids version is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Galpin

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. I bought it for my partners surprise party and it was a big hit. There was a mixture of adults and children. Even my autistic nephew enjoyed himself. Now, anytime we have a family gathering, I’m asked to bring this game.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: All around fun game! Great charade game for adults, and definitely keeps everybody laughing. Easy to follow and not a big mess of things or pieces to clean up afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious fun even with the in-laws!
customer_reviews.text: We like Cranium and wanted more. We got this for our son-in-law with concerns that we might be embarrassed by some of the cards. This didn't prove to be the case. We had a hilarious evening and are looking forward to the next night of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hegarty

customer_reviews.title: Moldy smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a FANTASTIC game, but the first box I bought smelled of mold—the cards had a horrible smell—so I bought this second box. Turns out, this one smells the same. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: MamaNola

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is hilarious! I love that it adds another element to basic charades and makes it new again. We played this at a family party and had a ball. It's best for adults, but kids can play too if you help them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Children AND grandchildren are having a ball with this. It was a big hit on New Year's Eve
customer_reviews.author: Janice L.

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: For a group of friends this game is hilarious, great fun! (not recommended for prudes or stiffs) open minded people will have a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Falcon Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Game arrive in excellent condition, and my nieces let me know they really enjoy playing it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Mreh.
customer_reviews.text: Mreh. Not worth it. Kind of weird. My husband liked it though. Was hoping it would be more “cards against humanity”.
customer_reviews.author: Katie J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious and our family loved playing it at a recent vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael L

customer_reviews.title: Great fun with a group
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun! This made me and my friends laugh. It also got us up and moving. Not for the self conscious, and like a lot of these games it's as much fun as you put into it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Very fun. My family enjoy using it at game nights.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Super funny
customer_reviews.text: This game is hilarious, it was a hit at our family vacation as well as game night with friends !
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game! Used to have regular cranium. Now as an adult love this after dark version! Bought one for myself and one as a gift
customer_reviews.author: MerriM

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun.  Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Super Fun game if you like acting out things and laughing at your friends and family. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Modrzejewski

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. I have the regular version of cranium which is fun but a little more complicated with the gameboard. This version is simpler and funnier in my opinion. Was shipped quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Cordero

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun. Makes you have to think a bit , get creative and have a ton of laughs!
customer_reviews.author: Lori santamaria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and easy game to figure out and play
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Some of the Cranium cards don’t pair well with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the Cranium cards don’t pair well with the Action cards. Other than that, with a group that’s willing to be silly, it’s a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Belmore

customer_reviews.title: Fun alternative
customer_reviews.text: This expansion box gives us more fun with the Cranium game. Enjoyable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Corsair174

customer_reviews.title: A great time !
customer_reviews.text: If you like board games , or family fun games . This is a must !
customer_reviews.author: Remelyn Stanley

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I am giving it three stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving it three stars is because I found the game to be a little complex. We just ended up turning the game into regular charades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible version of Cranium
customer_reviews.text: Not fun at all. Our family played it once and never again. Just gave it away while cleaning our apartment of clutter today. We love the original Cranium so this one was a huge disappointment and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Banks

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for a couples game night and we had a blast! It doesn't take a ton of set up and the rules are self-explanatory. I would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Maura Hill

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Game Box
customer_reviews.text: Game box was significantly damaged when received. Although the game box and contents were seal-wrapped, it really seemed to be a used game. Not a huge issue for a $10 game, but not a great impression. Will update after playing with review of game play.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game but I was slightly disappointed that it wasn't raunchy at all. Could totally play this with kids.
customer_reviews.author: fluffmom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game for groups/parties
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Had played regular Cranium before but this is faster and perhaps better suited to parties. There's something for everyone's skills. I highly recommend making sound effects permissible for the non-speaking cards
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mulhaire

customer_reviews.title: We had so much fun! Guys vs girls
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this game for a couple's game night. We had so much fun! Guys vs girls!
customer_reviews.author: Made in Miami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: new cranium player it seems a little advanced but i could blame it on illiteracy 😑.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game night hot
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit at game night! I only play one round and move into The next game.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Agababyan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. Awesome game. Everyone was laughing so much we had to take a break hahahah
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey Treskov

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play
customer_reviews.text: Great for game night either with friends or family! Easy to play!
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy playing this. It's a fun party game that allows for a bit less structure.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great game to play! Very enjoyable, everyone couldn't stop laughing. Great to play sober or not.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron - Jasmine Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's not like the original game at all
customer_reviews.text: It's just the acting and sculpting parts and doesn't seem to be as "adult" as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Knutsen

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: The box didn’t look new at all. It had no wrapping and was banged up on all sides.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This game gets loud and rowdy but tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Game night with friends. The guys acted like idiots and we loved every minute of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leta Holohan

customer_reviews.title: Adult Game that Beats Cards Against Humanity...
customer_reviews.text: Move over kid table, it's time for the adults to have some fun. This is a fresh break from the Cards Against Humanity/Apples to Apples craze... while those games are fun the first time- they quickly become repetitive, lack interaction, and you stop laughing at the cards you've heard 100 times before. You love this game, you should also try Telestrations After Dark- it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Weathers Riley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and challenging​, it puts your creativity to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Manolito

customer_reviews.title: Not our cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived timely and sounded like a fun party game. However, we tried to play it at a party without having read the instructions prior to the party. It was... Overcomplicated and nobody in the group (of smart people) really got it or enjoyed it. We loved regular cranium and another game by this company - but this was not our cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany O.

customer_reviews.title: ... some people in my group but a lot of fun once everyone figures out how to play
customer_reviews.text: Slight learning curb for some people in my group but a lot of fun once everyone figures out how to play.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good idea, but poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: It's a good idea, but poorly executed. A lot of the things you're supposed to do just don't work well together. Certainly good for a laugh once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Beck Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Good game.
customer_reviews.text: It was funny. Weird but funny. At one point in the night I had to sit on my brother as he tried to do his card...his a twig of guy so it was amusing. I'd definitely play again and only with people I'm comfortable with...not an icebreaker game lol
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Shenanigans for an adult hangout
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious with the perfect amount of raunchy. Cards against humanity-esque.
customer_reviews.author: CharD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun! Although, it says it should say either "draw" "sculpt" or "act out" on each of the cards and it doesn't. So we end up acting most of them out and rarely using the draw pad and the modeling clay, but it is still so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have played this game multiple times with various friends and family and the consensus is just bleh...
customer_reviews.author: Misty Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Fun categories, strange directions.
customer_reviews.text: Just an ok game - directions were clear but the concept of the game is a little weird! We had to tweak the instructions a bit so make it more interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Shari B

customer_reviews.title: I bought this game as a Christmas give for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game as a Christmas give for my sister-in-law. Unfortunately, the timer was broken when she received it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandchildren. There were several cards that needed to be removed due to subject matter.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Not what we thought it was going to be and kind of boring.
customer_reviews.author: jislas84

customer_reviews.title: Diet Dark, but that's A-OK!
customer_reviews.text: pretty fun, "Dark" just means it is appropriate for a group of adults without being kiddie- it implies that it is a more 'adult' game in the vein of CAH, that it certainly is not but that's okay, because I can play this with my grandma. plus the dough that comes with it is a really rad neon blue, which is a bonus in my book
customer_reviews.author: bk rokkit

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be more x rated lol but it is fun. Family game
customer_reviews.author: Marz_infinate_Barz

product_meta.title: Cranium Dark Game
product_meta.description:
Want to host an epic game night? This hilarious Cranium Dark game is sure to be a hit! You pick an Action card and show it to the rest of the players. Then pick a Cranium Card and keep it a secret. Without saying any of the words on the Cranium card, you must get the other players to guess what's on that Cranium card by expressing it in the style of the Action card. For example, can you get your friends to guess "milk a cow" while acting like a zombie -- or "fried chicken" while drawing with your eyes closed -- in just 60 seconds? Be the first player to collect 7 cards to win! Cranium and all related trademarks of Cranium, Inc. Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

BRAND STORY
By Hasbro Games
feature_bullets: The Party Game for People Who Want to Act Up
The game you play after dark
Great for game night with friends
Includes 400 cards, timer, Cranium Clay, 2 pads of paper, and instructions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars395 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
